amendment.description: To improve the Justice for the United States Victims of State Sponsored Terrorism Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 6617, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 4. Record Vote Number: 420.

action.text: Amendment SA 6617 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 6552. (consideration: CR S10074-10075) To improve the Justice for the United States Victims of State Sponsored Terrorism Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 6617, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 4. Record Vote Number: 420.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 6617, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 4. Record Vote Number: 420.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6617 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 6552.
